info.name: Mandelbrot in 1 tweet :)
info.description: Mandelbrot fractal in less than 280 characters

renderpass.code: void mainImage(out vec4 o,in vec2 d){vec2 p=d/iResolution.x*4.-vec2(2.5,1.1);vec2 z=p,r;float j=0.;for(int i=0;i<201;i++){r=p+vec2(z.x*z.x-z.y*z.y,2.*z.y*z.x);if(length(r)>2.)break;z=r;j+=1.;}o=vec4(step(j,199.)*j*vec3(0.05,j*0.0003,0.),1.);}
renderpass.name: Image
